description:
A persistent nightmare comes true when Kenshin`s old enemy, the former leader of a shadowy anti-Royalist organization, is hired to assassinate him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aratanaru Kessen e no Jokyoku: Semarikuru Ookami no Kage!
Dövüşe Sayılı Günler Kala: Kurdun Gölgesi Yaklaşıyor
การนองเลือดครั้งใหม่หมาป่าแห่งมิบุปรากฎตัว
新たなる血戦への序曲・迫り来る狼の影!
